attributes.action: award musician David Sylvian for 40 years contribution to British Music
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: David Sylvian has been on the British and Japanese music seen now for over 40 years with his early band 'Japan' and various solo and joint ventures. It would be nice for him to be recognised as an oustanding musician/songwriter and all round performer. I have been a huge fan for a long time now and am sure there are many others.
